page.title: 01BRICKENDON AREA/CAMERA VIEW
page.content:
From a photographer's point of view this part of{rural Hertfordshire is a picture in every direction. {Brickendon}itself, mixed dwellings round a{village}green, public house, a{chapel}and{historic houses.}A Scout {Camping Site,}High Leigh{Conference {Centre}& a{Weaver's Studio}at Hoddes- don. Surrounding area, arable fields & dairy farms, pretty cottages & a once moated farmhouse. Much of the area is {deciduous woodland}& horse riders using the{bridleways}make a pleasant picture. For horses and walkers,{Ermine Street,}the London to York{Roman Road,}is now a quiet foot- path. The busy London to Cambridge { {A.10}road, a working sandpit & children at play at the{Special School are more views for the camera.
{
